about_the_game:
About Divination:

Divination is believed to have been invented by Fuxi and is known as the Fuxi Eight Trigrams: "From the Taiji comes Yin and Yang; Yin and Yang produce the Four Symbols; the Four Symbols produce the Eight Trigrams; the Eight Trigrams determine fortune or misfortune, giving rise to great achievements." In the Zhou Dynasty, King Wen expanded this system into the 64 hexagrams of the I Ching.

Divination Guidelines:

  • Do not disrespect divine powers.

  • Silently focus on your query before divination. One query per divination; the same question cannot be asked repeatedly in a short period.

  • Maintain focus during divination. Avoid distractions such as talking, watching TV, or thinking of unrelated matters.

  • Do not pause midway through the divination process and then continue later.

  • Avoid suspicion, greed, or fear.

  • Divination is only for predicting future events, not past ones.

The Divination Includes:

 Fortune, wealth, family, health, traits, luck, family fortune, sickness, pregnancy, children, turnover, trading, people, finding people, lost items, outings, exams, lawsuits, career, business, fame, marriage, affairs, career change, opening a business, and decision-making.

  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB

short_description: Divination is a desktop-based divination tool that uses the sixty-four hexagrams from the I Ching to interpret the good or bad fortune of future events.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
